test.Behavior: Click, [visible label]:" Link activates
test.Video (optional): All MacOS Voice Control standard link tests clip
test.Notes (optional): <a>: Voice Control activates based on the accessible name, whether it's the visible name or created via ARIA

test.Behavior: Click, [visible label]:" Each link gets a number overlay (the first, 1, the second, 2). Then you say the number to activate that link.
test.Video (optional): All MacOS Voice Control standard link tests clip

test.Behavior:
Click, [visible label]:" Nothing happens
"Click, [aria-label]": Link activates

test.Task: Standard radio buttons -  aria-label, beginning match
test.Behavior:
Click, [visible label]:" Radio button receives focus, selected
"Click, [aria-label]:" The button gets a number overlay, "1." Then you say the number to activate the button.
test.Video (optional): All Mac OS Voice Control standard radio button input tests clip
test.Notes (optional):
<input type="radio">: Voice Control activates based on EITHER
- the visible name, regardless of aria-label, OR
- the accessible name

test.Task: Standard radio buttons -  aria-label, middle match
test.Behavior:
Click, [visible label]:" Radio button receives focus, selected
"Click, [aria-label]:" The button gets a number overlay, "1." Then you say the number to activate the button.
test.Video (optional): All Mac OS Voice Control standard radio button input tests clip

test.Task: Standard radio buttons -  aria-label, no match
test.Video (optional): All Mac OS Voice Control standard radio button input tests clip

test.Behavior:
Click, [visible label]": Checkbox receives focus, checked (or unchecked)
"Click, [aria-label]": Checkbox receives focus, checked (or unchecked)
test.Video (optional): All Mac OS Voice Control standard checkbox input tests clip
test.Notes (optional): <input type="checkbox">: Voice Control picks up both the visible label and ARIA if the aria-label is contained within the name...

test.Behavior:
Click, [visible label]": Checkbox receives focus, checked (or unchecked)
"Click, [aria-label]": Checkbox receives focus, checked (or unchecked)
test.Video (optional): All Mac OS Voice Control standard checkbox input tests clip

test.Behavior:
Click, [visible label]": Nothing happens
"Click, [aria-label]": Checkbox receives focus, checked (or unchecked)
test.Video (optional): All Mac OS Voice Control standard checkbox input tests clip
test.Notes (optional): ...but if they don't match at all, it only uses the aria-label.
